predicate.note: Frames file for 'rebut' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry, which isn't surprising because this is a made-up verb, backformed from "rebuttal". No comparison.

example.name: the only example?
example.text: Japanese government officials, *trace* eager *trace* to rebut foreign criticism of Japanese investments overseas, hailed the transaction as proof foreigners can make similar investments in Japan.
example.arg: foreign criticism of Japanese investments overseas
